Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [E] You are so good to me I did not know you but I [B] Heard you call out my name I couldn’t see you but I [E] Felt you reach into my heart Take all my fear and shame [B] Pour all your kindness in You turned my life around
Pre-Chorus 1: And[C#M7] now You have o[E]pened up my [C#M7]eyes To the m[E]ystery of Your g[F#M7]race [A]
Chorus: I could sing, I could [E]dance in the st[A]reet I could sh[B]out from the r[A]oof How Your l[E]ove set me f[A]ree How this G[B]ospel is t[A]rue You’re the w[E]ay, You’re the t[A]ruth, You’re the l[B]ife And I will a[A]lways follow [F#M7]You You make all things [A]new Jesus You are [E]good. [A] [E] [A] [B] [A] [B] [A]
{new_page} Verse 2: [E] You are like no-one else You reign forever Jesus [B] Name above every name Today, forever you’re the same [E] You conquered sin for me Your blood has made me clean [B] Your mercy covers me Your goodness leads me on
Pre-Chorus 2: And [C#M7]now I can n[E]ever be the s[C#M7]ame You a[E]lone deserve my p[F#M7]raise [A]
Chorus: I could sing, I could [E]dance in the st[A]reet I could sh[B]out from the r[A]oof How Your l[E]ove set me f[A]ree How this G[B]ospel is t[A]rue You’re the w[E]ay, You’re the t[A]ruth, You’re the l[B]ife And I will a[A]lways follow [F#M7]You You make all things [A]new Jesus You are [E]good. [A] [E] [A] [B] [A] [B] [A]
Bridge: [F#M7] There is o[A]nly one way, [F#M7] There is o[A]nly one name, [F#M7] There is o[A]nly one God, [F#M7] Jesus Y[A]ou, and You alone can s[E]ave. [A] [E][A] [B] I could sing...
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 you are so good to me i did not know you but i heard you call out my name i couldnt see you but i felt you reach into my heart take all my fear and shame pour all your kindness in you turned my life around prechorus 1 and now you have opened up my eyes to the mystery of your grace chorus i could sing i could dance in the street i could shout from the roof how your love set me free how this gospel is true youre the way youre the truth youre the life and i will always follow you you make all things new jesus you are good verse 2 you are like noone else you reign forever jesus name above every name today forever youre the same you conquered sin for me your blood has made me clean your mercy covers me your goodness leads me on prechorus 2 and now i can never be the same you alone deserve my praise chorus i could sing i could dance in the street i could shout from the roof how your love set me free how this gospel is true youre the way youre the truth youre the life and i will always follow you you make all things new jesus you are good bridge there is only one way there is only one name there is only one god jesus you and you alone can save i could sing
